```{r}
 f = function() {
```

```{r}
rounak=function(){
  a=1:100
  sample(a,replace = FALSE)
}
```

```{r}
pritha=function(a=c(1,2,3,4,5)){
  sum(a)
  a^2
  seq(from=2, to=4,by=1)
}
```

calling the function
```{r}
g= function(o) {
  for(i in o){
    print(i+2)
}}
```

```{r}
g(5)
```
```{r}
g= function(o) {
  for(i in 1:o){
    print(i+2)
}}
```


```{r}
g(5)
```
